title: How do we get students to practice playing and marching and enjoy it or want to practice (marching band)? - Quora

response.answer_text: Easy. Assuming your students are adolescents, make every practice a social event. Reward not every but a few rehearsals with pizza and soft drinks and maybe ice-cream, develop student leadership and peer-to-peer relationships by establishing a system of mentoring and coaching, and invite the community to watch your practices as often as you can. That’ll do it!
